code: import axios from"axios";import{base_url}from"../../utils/baseUrl";import{config}from"../../utils/axiosconfig";const login=async userData=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(base_url,"user/admin-login"),userData);if(response.data){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;};const getOrders=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"user/get-all-orders"),config);return response.data;};const getOrder=async id=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(base_url,"user/get-order-by-user/").concat(id),"",config);return response.data;};const authService={login,getOrders,getOrder};export default authService;
